HERP.content: where Derrida is beyond Heidegger’s aim (propos) [acc. Derrida]: in the non synonymy of dissemblance, heterogeneity, disproportion, incommensurability, nonexchange, excess of every measure/symmetry > democracy to-come
HERP.linkedContent: where Derrida is beyond Heidegger’s aim (propos) [acc. Derrida]: in the non synonymy of dissemblance, heterogeneity, disproportion, incommensurability, nonexchange, excess of every measure/symmetry > democracy to-come

HASD.content: X (text, writing, trace, differance, hymen, supplement, pharmakon, parergon) : not subject to Aufhebung, dialectic, neither concept nor name > lends itself to a series of names, calls for another syntax, exceeds order and structure of predicative discourse [has induced accusation against Derrida of repeating procedures of negative theology]
HASD.linkedContent: X (text, writing, trace, differance, hymen, supplement, pharmakon, parergon) : not subject to Aufhebung, dialectic, neither concept nor name > lends itself to a series of names, calls for another syntax, exceeds order and structure of predicative discourse [has induced accusation against Derrida of repeating procedures of negative theology]

A.content: death is figure of the aporia in which “death” and death can replace (metonymy that carries name beyond name, beyond name of name) all that is possible as impossible: love, gift, other, testimony
A.linkedContent: death is figure of the aporia in which “death” and death can replace (metonymy that carries name beyond name, beyond name of name) all that is possible as impossible: love, gift, other, testimony

DS.content: what holds for “hymen” holds for pharmakon, supplément, différance > double, contradictory, undecidable value derived from their syntax > alternative btwn internal/external inoperative > simply dealing w/ greater/lesser syntactical units & w/ economic differences in condensation > but don’t reduce these to the same, there’s a serial law in these points of indefinite pivoting, mark spots that can’t be mastered > funny they all have to do w/ writing
DS.linkedContent: what holds for “hymen” holds for pharmakon, supplément, différance > double, contradictory, undecidable value derived from their syntax > alternative btwn internal/external inoperative > simply dealing w/ greater/lesser syntactical units & w/ economic differences in condensation > but don’t reduce these to the same, there’s a serial law in these points of indefinite pivoting, mark spots that can’t be mastered > funny they all have to do w/ writing

POS.content: risk meaning nothing, start to play (i.e. archi-trace, archi-writing, reserve, brisure, articulation, supplement, differance; there will be others) [Derrida as prophet of himself]
POS.linkedContent: risk meaning nothing, start to play (i.e. archi-trace, archi-writing, reserve, brisure, articulation, supplement, differance; there will be others) [Derrida as prophet of himself]

POS.content: gram, reserve, incision, trace, spacing, blank, supplement, margin, pharmakon—a list w/ no taxonomical closure, not a lexicon: not atoms but focal points (foyers), crucibles of economic condensation, sites of passage: spread out through text, each in a different way
POS.linkedContent: gram, reserve, incision, trace, spacing, blank, supplement, margin, pharmakon—a list w/ no taxonomical closure, not a lexicon: not atoms but focal points (foyers), crucibles of economic condensation, sites of passage: spread out through text, each in a different way

POS.content: gathering Derrida’s work into a “sheaf,” historic/systematic crossroads, is structural impossibility of limiting network of differance, not a master-word, always finds itself in others
POS.linkedContent: gathering Derrida’s work into a “sheaf,” historic/systematic crossroads, is structural impossibility of limiting network of differance, not a master-word, always finds itself in others

POS.content: Derrida’s undecidables, unities of simulacrum, “false” verbal properties that can’t be included in philosophical binary, but still inhabit it, resisting, disorganizing, w/out ever constituting a 3rd term, a solution: hymen, gram, incision, spacing, supplement, pharmakon, margin
POS.linkedContent: Derrida’s undecidables, unities of simulacrum, “false” verbal properties that can’t be included in philosophical binary, but still inhabit it, resisting, disorganizing, w/out ever constituting a 3rd term, a solution: hymen, gram, incision, spacing, supplement, pharmakon, margin

POS.content: DS re-marks a nerve, fold, angle, doubled fold of undecidable, a mark marks both marked and the mark, re-marked site of mark, can’t be counted on list of themes—hollow is the relief: hymen, fold, square, blank, margin, supernumber, column, air, chandelier
POS.linkedContent: DS re-marks a nerve, fold, angle, doubled fold of undecidable, a mark marks both marked and the mark, re-marked site of mark, can’t be counted on list of themes—hollow is the relief: hymen, fold, square, blank, margin, supernumber, column, air, chandelier

ROP.content: the 20 or so other names that, w/out being synonyms, belong to the same chain
ROP.linkedContent: the 20 or so other names that, w/out being synonyms, belong to the same chain

ROP.content: deconstruction announces status w/out status of nonfinite # of names/quasi-concepts: the thinking of writing called for this, but it’s better thematized and formalized in theory of double bind, stricture of double band, and especially non-ontological remaining
ROP.linkedContent: deconstruction announces status w/out status of nonfinite # of names/quasi-concepts: the thinking of writing called for this, but it’s better thematized and formalized in theory of double bind, stricture of double band, and especially non-ontological remaining

ROP.content: double bind at work on examples of all undecidable figures (hymen, pharmakon…), carry predicates incompatible btwn themselves, in their very btwn, interlacing, sumplukē, chiasmatic invagination > but each one, in its sumplukē, makes up a single trace [?]
ROP.linkedContent: double bind at work on examples of all undecidable figures (hymen, pharmakon…), carry predicates incompatible btwn themselves, in their very btwn, interlacing, sumplukē, chiasmatic invagination > but each one, in its sumplukē, makes up a single trace [?]

ATIA.content: animal as tout autre, as tout autre est tout autre, unreadable, undecidable, abyssal, secret
ATIA.linkedContent: animal as tout autre, as tout autre est tout autre, unreadable, undecidable, abyssal, secret

PS.content: (with remarkable/ambiguous exception of Hegel) God is Death: infinite life, life w/out difference > w/in life God-Death names finitude, difference w/in life > mais l'autre nom de la même chose ne veut pas dire la même chose que le premier nom, il n'en est pas synonyme et c'est toute l’histoire
PS.linkedContent: (with remarkable/ambiguous exception of Hegel) God is Death: infinite life, life w/out difference > w/in life God-Death names finitude, difference w/in life > mais l'autre nom de la même chose ne veut pas dire la même chose que le premier nom, il n'en est pas synonyme et c'est toute l’histoire

DIF.content: differance must be superseded, not considered arkhē of chain, thus not theological
DIF.linkedContent: differance must be superseded, not considered arkhē of chain, thus not theological

DIF.content: chain in which differance lends itself to nonsynonymous substitutions: reserve, arch-writing, archi-trace, spacing, supplement, pharmakon, hymen, margin-mark-march
DIF.linkedContent: chain in which differance lends itself to nonsynonymous substitutions: reserve, arch-writing, archi-trace, spacing, supplement, pharmakon, hymen, margin-mark-march

O.content: [nonsynonymous synonyms] > never enclosed in finite taxonomy > no lexicon as such, can’t be pinned to a point, marks of dissemination, undecidable acc. 2 of binary opposition, not sublatable into 3 of speculative dialectics > displaced along angle of certain re-folding
O.linkedContent: [nonsynonymous synonyms] > never enclosed in finite taxonomy > no lexicon as such, can’t be pinned to a point, marks of dissemination, undecidable acc. 2 of binary opposition, not sublatable into 3 of speculative dialectics > displaced along angle of certain re-folding

SW.content: “all my nicknames, I have so many” [re: tallith]
SW.linkedContent: “all my nicknames, I have so many” [re: tallith]

RGE.content: Bataille changes names [extremity of the possible becomes meditation] > none of the concepts satisfies the demand
RGE.linkedContent: Bataille changes names [extremity of the possible becomes meditation] > none of the concepts satisfies the demand

REST.content: Derrida wonders if topos of abyss (a fortiori mis-en-abyme) might dampen (amortir) the angular necessity of this other topic, other pas: undecidables, la figure du voilement, du linge voilant, l’hymen, la soquette ou le bas, entre pied et chaussure
REST.linkedContent: Derrida wonders if topos of abyss (a fortiori mis-en-abyme) might dampen (amortir) the angular necessity of this other topic, other pas: undecidables, la figure du voilement, du linge voilant, l’hymen, la soquette ou le bas, entre pied et chaussure

AFR.content: Condillac: “excess, difference, remainder then are words which signify precisely the same thing: but in using them the mental aspects are not the same…” [how not to be frivolous]
AFR.linkedContent: Condillac: “excess, difference, remainder then are words which signify precisely the same thing: but in using them the mental aspects are not the same…” [how not to be frivolous]

PSSS.content: numerous figures of the impossible: hospitality, forgiveness, gift—above all [?] the “perhaps,” the “what if,” the unpredictability of event
PSSS.linkedContent: numerous figures of the impossible: hospitality, forgiveness, gift—above all [?] the “perhaps,” the “what if,” the unpredictability of event

HST.content: tears, work of mourning, as process of hospitality > also, the culture of smile, welcoming of a promise [example of “as” logic, a rethinking conditioned by difference in same]
HST.linkedContent: tears, work of mourning, as process of hospitality > also, the culture of smile, welcoming of a promise [example of “as” logic, a rethinking conditioned by difference in same]

HST.content: forgiveness granted to other—supreme gift of hospitality > host too must ask forgiveness, welcoming must be infinite, one can never give enough to surprise of visitor, messianic surprise: host, always lacking, at fault, unprepared
HST.linkedContent: forgiveness granted to other—supreme gift of hospitality > host too must ask forgiveness, welcoming must be infinite, one can never give enough to surprise of visitor, messianic surprise: host, always lacking, at fault, unprepared

HST.content: must welcome the infinite (for Levinas, that’s 1st hospitality), forgive beyond me, what is not mine to forgive [forgiving in my name but only in the name of the other]: must think substitution from limit-experiences (decision, gift, forgiveness), from possible-impossible, the impossible of the possible
HST.linkedContent: must welcome the infinite (for Levinas, that’s 1st hospitality), forgive beyond me, what is not mine to forgive [forgiving in my name but only in the name of the other]: must think substitution from limit-experiences (decision, gift, forgiveness), from possible-impossible, the impossible of the possible

LI.content: or, or rather, even parentheses, i.e. “citation (iterability)” > not genus/species, not identity, classical logic fractured in its code, parasitic contamination entame all these relations, which is why words have to be qualified, supplemented by others
LI.linkedContent: or, or rather, even parentheses, i.e. “citation (iterability)” > not genus/species, not identity, classical logic fractured in its code, parasitic contamination entame all these relations, which is why words have to be qualified, supplemented by others

LI.content: [re: citationality (iterability)] parentheses do not mark synonyms/identification > iterability marks citationality in its possibility, its “graphematic root”
LI.linkedContent: [re: citationality (iterability)] parentheses do not mark synonyms/identification > iterability marks citationality in its possibility, its “graphematic root”

LI.content: parasitic structure: writing, graft, mark, marche, margin, differance, undecidable, supplement, pharmakon, hymen, parergon
LI.linkedContent: parasitic structure: writing, graft, mark, marche, margin, differance, undecidable, supplement, pharmakon, hymen, parergon

LI.content: [nonsynonomous synonyms]: certain functional analogy, yet remain singular/irreducible to one another, as do the textual chains from which they’re inseparable: each marked w/ iterablility that seems to belong to their series
LI.linkedContent: [nonsynonomous synonyms]: certain functional analogy, yet remain singular/irreducible to one another, as do the textual chains from which they’re inseparable: each marked w/ iterablility that seems to belong to their series

TN.content: intruder on inside, constitutively haunted by some hetero-affection related to spacing, a host, a parasite, pharmakon, ghost: [each of these figures] habite en revenant tout for intérieur (inhabit one’s heart of hearts as a ghost)
TN.linkedContent: intruder on inside, constitutively haunted by some hetero-affection related to spacing, a host, a parasite, pharmakon, ghost: [each of these figures] habite en revenant tout for intérieur (inhabit one’s heart of hearts as a ghost)

TN.content: Derrida’s “if there is any (s’il y en a)” vs. Nancy’s “there is no ‘the’” > two irreducibly different deconstructions (one turns to a conditional, the other to a negative modality)
TN.linkedContent: Derrida’s “if there is any (s’il y en a)” vs. Nancy’s “there is no ‘the’” > two irreducibly different deconstructions (one turns to a conditional, the other to a negative modality)

TN.content: s’il y en a: pure & unconditional in so many forms (event, invention, gift, forgiving, witnessing, hospitality, and so on)
TN.linkedContent: s’il y en a: pure & unconditional in so many forms (event, invention, gift, forgiving, witnessing, hospitality, and so on)

AD.content: hospitality, welcome of face, attention: this series of metonymies are all the same only where they withdraw, like the other, from theme—each welcomes (says “yes” to) the other
AD.linkedContent: hospitality, welcome of face, attention: this series of metonymies are all the same only where they withdraw, like the other, from theme—each welcomes (says “yes” to) the other

AD.content: welcome is a quasi-synonym of hospitality: copula that brings them together binds phenomena of unbinding (déliasion) (infinite separation of any hospitality worth its name)
AD.linkedContent: welcome is a quasi-synonym of hospitality: copula that brings them together binds phenomena of unbinding (déliasion) (infinite separation of any hospitality worth its name)

BSi.content: bêtise not exactly stupidity, foolishness, imbecility, idiotic, Dummheit, Kleinigkeit, etc. [example of nonsynonymous synonym]
BSi.linkedContent: bêtise not exactly stupidity, foolishness, imbecility, idiotic, Dummheit, Kleinigkeit, etc. [example of nonsynonymous synonym]

BSi.content: still, difference btwn these words can only be marked in context, which doesn’t imply an absolute relativity of context: bêtise can’t mean anything at all, not an idealized, objective, “free” ideality > translation problems occur in same language, same cultural code
BSi.linkedContent: still, difference btwn these words can only be marked in context, which doesn’t imply an absolute relativity of context: bêtise can’t mean anything at all, not an idealized, objective, “free” ideality > translation problems occur in same language, same cultural code

BSi.content: trousse (case, kit), trousseau (bunch of keys) > the etymology of these words includes everything Derrida’s been working on in BS [how Derrida can open up to “everything”—elsewhere, again]
BSi.linkedContent: trousse (case, kit), trousseau (bunch of keys) > the etymology of these words includes everything Derrida’s been working on in BS [how Derrida can open up to “everything”—elsewhere, again]

EU.content: [re: nonsynonymous synonyms] all these indices should be multiplied
EU.linkedContent: [re: nonsynonymous synonyms] all these indices should be multiplied

SPEC.content: curtain (rideau): canvases, veils, hymens, umbrellas > Derrida neither has time nor taste (goût) to show how they accord to same law (accomplished by itself or done w/out)
SPEC.linkedContent: curtain (rideau): canvases, veils, hymens, umbrellas > Derrida neither has time nor taste (goût) to show how they accord to same law (accomplished by itself or done w/out)
